answers.answer: I'm sorry your on bedrest.  However....what a great time to read a few good books and get lots of sleep prior to the every few hour feedings and sleep deprivation we all deal with in those early months.  I say kick those feet up, let DH take care of you and enjoy!!  I'm dealing with a toddler who will not sleep....I wouldn't mind being put on bedrest for a few days..lol.I don't mean to make light, just trying to cheer you up!  Not long now!! XOXO

I feel for you. I see my doctor tomorrow and am afraid she is going to tell me the same thing. I was hoping to work for a little while longer. I am 34 weeks as of Tuesday.I highly recommend Sudoku puzzles and I just started reading "The Help" by Kathryn Stockett (it is great so far).

I feel for you too!  I have been on "modified bedrest" since I was 20 weeks along.  (Because of some complications with my heart.)  Four weeks ago, I was diagnosed with preeclampsia and moved to "very strict" bedrest (no getting up for anything except going to the bathroom).  I'm now just over 35 weeks along.First of all, I want to say that it is HARD!  Anyone who says, "Boy, I sure wish I could be on bed rest" has obviously never had to do it before.  It is not an easy thing and you're totally fine for feeling completely overwhelmed about it.I am also normally a very busy person and a social butterfly.  Plus, I have a two year old. But luckily my husband has been SO supportive and we have a lot of help.My laptop has been my saving grace during this time.  It's my connection with the outside world and my way to stay social.GOOD LUCK to you!!  I know it's not easy!  But hang in there!!
PS- we adopted our 2 year old, so this is my first experience with pregnancy.  We did IVF to get this baby here.

question: I had a follow up appt on monday from the head and the contractions. I was feeling soooo much better. My doctor said what did you do to get rid of teh headaches, I said I PRAYED!! I was hoping he would have let me went back to work on Tuesday, but he said no. So I am at home for the duration of my pregnancy. I will be 35 weeks tomorrow. I know it seems like it going to come quick, but not to me. I am a busy body, I like to be productive in side the home and outside the home. This is going to be along 4 weeks. My csection is schedule for Nov. 3.
title: Bedrest...Bored
